author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Tracker geometry configuration and its test script

This PR is based on #26371 and #26373

#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun Geometry/TrackerGeometryBuilder/test/python/testTrackerGeometry.py
```
The error is due to a missing **track:DDTrackerRingAlgo** algorithm implementation and should be ignored for now.
```
DD4CMS                 +++ Start executing algorithm DDCMS_track_DDTrackerRingAlgo....
DD4CMS           ERROR ++ FAILED  NOT ADDING SUBDETECTOR 00000000 = track:DDTrackerRingAlgo
```
#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

no back port is needed
title: DD4hep: Tracker Geometry Description
